00020 // URI: <scheme>:<scheme-specific-part>
00021 // URL: <scheme>://<user>:<password>@<host>:<port>/<url-path>
00022 
00023 // ------------------------------------------
00024 // Scheme_Name Description
00025 // ------------------------------------------
00026 // ftp         File Transfer Protocol
00027 // http        Hypertext Transfer Protocol
00028 // news        USENET news
00029 // nntp        USENET news using NNTP access
00030 // wais        Wide Area Information Servers
00031 // gopher      The Gopher Protocol
00032 // mailto      Electronic mail address
00033 // telnet      Reference to interactive sessions
00034 // prospero    Prospero Directory Service
00035 // ------------------------------------------
00036 
00037 // URN: "urn:" <NID> ":" <NSS>
00038 // NID specifies the Namespace ID and NSS specifies the Namespace Specific String.
00039 // URN does not resolve to a unique, physical location. URNs serve as persistent resource identifiers.
00040 
00079 #define U_URL_TO_PARAM(url) (url).getUrlData(),(url).getUrlDataLen()
00080 #define U_URL_TO_TRACE(url) (url).getUrlDataLen(),(url).getUrlData()
00081 
00082 template <class T> class UVector;
00083 
00084 class U_EXPORT Url {
00085 public:
00086 
00087         // Check for memory error
00088         U_MEMORY_TEST
00089 
00090         // Allocator e Deallocator
00091         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00092         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00093 
00094         static UString* str_ftp;
00095         static UString* str_smtp;
00096         static UString* str_pop3;
00097         static UString* str_http;
00098         static UString* str_https;
00099 
00105         Url()
00106                 {
00107                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "", 0)
00108 
00109                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00110 
00111                 service_end = user_begin = user_end = host_begin = host_end = path_begin = path_end = query = -1;
00112                 }
00113 
00121         Url(const UString& x) : url(x)
00122                 {
00123                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00124 
00125                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00126 
00127                 findpos();
00128                 }
00129 
00137         Url(const char* t, uint32_t tlen) : url(t, tlen)
00138                 {
00139                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url, "%S,%u", t, tlen)
00140 
00141                 if (str_ftp == 0) str_allocate();
00142 
00143                 findpos();
00144                 }
00145 
00149         ~Url()
00150                 {
00151                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, Url)
00152                 }
00153 
00154         // ASSEGNAZIONI
00155 
00156         void set(const Url& u)
00157                 {
00158                 service_end = u.service_end;
00159                 user_begin  = u.user_begin;
00160                 user_end    = u.user_end;
00161                 host_begin  = u.host_begin;
00162                 host_end    = u.host_end;
00163                 path_begin  = u.path_begin;
00164                 path_end    = u.path_end;
00165                 query       = u.query;
00166                 }
00167 
00168         Url(const Url& u) : url(u.url)
00169                 {
00170                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00171 
00172                 set(u);
00173                 }
00174 
00175         Url& operator=(const Url& u)
00176                 {
00177                 U_MEMORY_TEST_COPY(u)
00178 
00179                 url = u.url;
00180 
00181                 set(u);
00182 
00183                 return *this;
00184                 }
00185 
00186         void set(const UString& x)
00187                 {
00188                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::set(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00189 
00190                 url = x;
00191 
00192                 findpos();
00193                 }
00194 
00195         UString   get() const { return url; }
00196         bool    empty() const { return url.empty(); }
00197 
00198         const char* getUrlData() const    { return url.data(); }
00199         uint32_t    getUrlDataLen() const { return url.size(); }
00200 
00209         UString getService();

00211         bool isHTTP()
00212                 {
00213                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTP()")
00214 
00215                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_http)
00216 
00217                 bool result = (getService() == *str_http);
00218 
00219                 U_RETURN(result);
00220                 }
00221 
00222         bool isHTTPS()
00223                 {
00224                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isHTTPS()")
00225 
00226                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(str_https)
00227 
00228                 bool result = (getService() == *str_https);
00229 
00230                 U_RETURN(result);
00231                 }
00232 
00240         void setService(const char* service, uint32_t n);

00251         UString getUser();
00252 
00258         bool setUser(const char* user, uint32_t n);
00259 
00263         void eraseUser()
00264                 {
00265                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseUser()")
00266 
00267                 if (user_begin < user_end)
00268                         {
00269                         (void) url.erase(user_begin, user_end + 1);
00270 
00271                         findpos();
00272                         }
00273                 }
00274 
00281         bool isLocalFile()
00282                 {
00283                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isLocalFile()")
00284 
00285                 bool result = (host_begin < host_end ? true : false); // Is there a host ?
00286 
00287                 U_RETURN(result);
00288                 }

00371         bool isQuery()
00372                 {
00373                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::isQuery()")
00374 
00375                 bool result = (path_end < (int)(url.size() - 1));
00376 
00377                 U_RETURN(result);
00378                 }

00397 
00401         void eraseQuery()
00402                 {
00403                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::eraseQuery()")
00404 
00405                 if (path_end < (int)url.size())
00406                         {
00407                         (void) url.erase(path_end);
00408 
00409                         query = path_end;
00410                         }
00411                 }

00478         static void encode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00479                 {
00480                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::encode(%.*S,%u,%p,%S)", len, input, len, &buffer, extra_enc_chars)
00481 
00482                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_encode((const unsigned char*)input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), extra_enc_chars));
00483 
00484                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00485                 }
00486 
00487         static void encode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, const char* extra_enc_chars = 0)
00488                 { encode(input.data(), input.size(), buffer, extra_enc_chars); }
00489 
00497         static void decode(const char* input, uint32_t len, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00498                 {
00499                 U_TRACE(0, "Url::decode(%.*S,%u,%p,%b)", len, input, len, &buffer, no_line_break)
00500 
00501                 buffer.size_adjust(u_url_decode(input, len, (unsigned char*)buffer.data(), no_line_break));
00502 
00503                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer.size() = %u", buffer.size())
00504                 }
00505 
00506         static void decode(const UString& input, UString& buffer, bool no_line_break = false)
00507                 { decode(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(input), buffer, no_line_break); }
00508 
00509         static void str_allocate();

00523         UString url;      // Content string - not first for object dump...
00524         int service_end,  // End position of the service.
00525                  user_begin,   // begin position of the user.
00526                  user_end,     // end position of the user.
00527                  host_begin,   // begin position of the host.
00528                  host_end,     // end position of the host.
00529                  path_begin,   // begin position of the path.
00530                  path_end,     // end position of the path.
00531                  query;        // start position of the last readed query entry.
00532 
00535         void findpos();
